subject: AI & Agents
title: A/B Testing AI Features
description: A micro-lesson that makes A/B Testing AI Features usable.

hook.text: The new AI search is 'obviously better.' But 60% of users prefer the old keyword search.

buildup.text: A/B testing splits users between variants to measure real-world impact objectively.

discovery.text: For AI features: test the full experience, not just the model. UI, latency, and trust all matter.

twist.text: Novelty effect: users engage more with anything new. Wait 2+ weeks for stable results.

climax.text: Pre-register your hypothesis and metrics. Don't change them after seeing results.

quiz.question: What is the novelty effect in A/B testing?
options: Users engage more with new features simply because they're new
